tickets.title: Update home page hero section headline to 'VAMOS VAMOS'
tickets.description:
Replace the current hero section headline text with 'VAMOS VAMOS' while maintaining all existing visual effects, styling, and supporting elements.

**Changes:**
- Replace headline text in HeroSection component from 'Your Tech Partner as a Service' to 'VAMOS VAMOS'
- Keep the aurora gradient text effect on the new headline
- Maintain all other sections: badge, description paragraph, CTA button, Problems section, Solutions grid, CTA section, and FAQ section
- No changes to layout, animations, or responsive behavior

**Files to modify:**
- src/app/(logged-out)/home/components/hero-section.tsx

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Hero section displays 'VAMOS VAMOS' as the main headline
- Aurora gradient effect is applied to the new headline text
- All supporting elements remain unchanged and functional
- Page is responsive on mobile, tablet, and desktop
- Build passes without errors
- Lint and typecheck pass without errors
